name: Rekindle (itch) (JessejamesA)
description:
Rekindle is a top down survival game where you need to gather wood and increase the brightness of your campfires in order to escape from the dark woods.

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys- movement

E- Interaction

Rekindle was made and developed by:

  • Gideon Addai
  • Jessejames Aguigui
  • Cooper Brann
  • Trey Gleason
  • Thomas Ives
  • Casey LaBay

Please fill out the feedback below, once you have completed the game.
